projectDescription: Comprehensive hackathon management platform with user management, hackathon creation, team formation, project submission, judging system, and community features.

sprints.name: Sprint 1: User Management & Authentication
sprints.goal: Complete user management system including authentication, authorization, role management, and user profiles.

sprints.name: Sprint 2: Hackathon Creation & Management
sprints.goal: Implement hackathon builder and visual customization tools for organizers.

sprints.name: Sprint 3: Registration & Team Management
sprints.goal: Build registration system and team formation features.

sprints.name: Sprint 4: Project Submission & Showcase
sprints.goal: Create project submission portal and gallery system.

sprints.name: Sprint 5: Judging System
sprints.goal: Implement judge management, scoring, and results system.

sprints.name: Sprint 6: Communication & Community
sprints.goal: Build discussion forums, networking features, and communication tools.

tickets.title: Create Authentication Pages Layout
tickets.description: Set up login, register, forgot-password, reset-password, and verify-email page components with responsive design and routing in Next.js.

tickets.title: Build Registration Form Component
tickets.description: Implement registration form with email, username, password fields, real-time validation using React Hook Form + Zod, and password strength indicator.

tickets.title: Build Login Form Component
tickets.description: Create login form with email/password fields, remember me checkbox, forgot password link, and error handling for invalid credentials.

tickets.title: Implement Social OAuth Login UI
tickets.description: Add OAuth login buttons for GitHub, Google, LinkedIn with popup/redirect flow handling and loading states.

tickets.title: Create Password Reset Flow UI
tickets.description: Build forgot password form, email confirmation screen, reset password form with token validation, and success/error handling.

tickets.title: Build Email Verification Flow
tickets.description: Create email verification pending page, success/failure pages, resend functionality with countdown timer, and expired link handling.

tickets.title: Implement Wallet Connection UI
tickets.description: Add Connect Wallet button, wallet selection modal (MetaMask, WalletConnect), connection status indicator, and signature request handling.

tickets.title: Create Authentication State Management
tickets.description: Set up global auth context/store with useAuth hook, token storage, automatic refresh, auth guards for protected routes, and role-based rendering.

tickets.title: Build User Profile Creation Flow
tickets.description: Create multi-step profile wizard with avatar upload, skills selector, bio editor, social links, and profile completion progress indicator.

tickets.title: Implement Session Management UI
tickets.description: Build active sessions display, device/location info, session termination controls, and suspicious activity alerts.

tickets.title: Create Account Settings Page
tickets.description: Design account settings with email change, password update, 2FA setup (prep), connected accounts management, and account deletion option.

tickets.title: Build Role Switching Interface
tickets.description: Implement role selector for multi-role users, role-specific dashboard switching, and permission-based UI element visibility.

tickets.title: Create Role Selection Component
tickets.description: Build role selection interface for registration with options for Participant, Organizer, Judge, Sponsor, and ability to request multiple roles.

tickets.title: Build Role-Based Dashboard Router
tickets.description: Implement dynamic dashboard routing that displays different dashboard layouts based on user's active role (participant/organizer/judge/sponsor/admin).

tickets.title: Create Role Switching UI
tickets.description: Design role switcher dropdown in navbar for users with multiple roles, showing current active role and available roles to switch.

tickets.title: Implement Role Request Modal
tickets.description: Build modal for requesting additional roles with reason field, supporting documents upload, and submission confirmation.

tickets.title: Create Role-Based Navigation Menu
tickets.description: Implement dynamic navigation menu that shows/hides menu items based on user's current active role and permissions.

tickets.title: Build Permission-Based Component Wrapper
tickets.description: Create HOC/component wrapper that conditionally renders UI elements based on user permissions (e.g., <RequireRole role="organizer">).

tickets.title: Design Role Management Admin Panel
tickets.description: Build admin interface to view all users, their roles, pending role requests, with approve/reject actions and bulk operations.

tickets.title: Create Role Request Status Page
tickets.description: Implement page showing user's role request history, current status (pending/approved/rejected), and admin feedback.

tickets.title: Build Role Badge Components
tickets.description: Design visual role badges/indicators to display on user profiles, comments, and team member lists with role-specific colors/icons.

tickets.title: Implement Organizer Dashboard
tickets.description: Create organizer-specific dashboard with hackathon creation button, managed hackathons list, and quick stats overview.

tickets.title: Build Judge Dashboard
tickets.description: Design judge-specific dashboard showing assigned hackathons, pending reviews count, and scoring deadlines.

tickets.title: Create Sponsor Dashboard
tickets.description: Implement sponsor dashboard with sponsored hackathons, prize management, and participant engagement metrics.

tickets.title: Build Admin Dashboard
tickets.description: Create admin dashboard with platform statistics, user management shortcuts, content moderation queue, and system health indicators.

tickets.title: Implement Role-Based Feature Gates
tickets.description: Add UI gates that disable/enable features based on role (e.g., "Create Hackathon" button only for organizers).

tickets.title: Set Up Authentication Database Schema
tickets.description: Create users, user_profiles, sessions, oauth_accounts, password_resets, email_verifications, and wallet_addresses tables with proper indexes and constraints.

tickets.title: Implement User Registration Endpoint
tickets.description: Build POST /api/auth/register with email/username validation, password hashing with bcrypt, duplicate checking, and email verification token generation.

tickets.title: Create Login Endpoint with JWT
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/auth/login with credential validation, JWT access token (15min) and refresh token (7days) generation, and failed attempt tracking.

tickets.title: Implement OAuth Provider Integration
tickets.description: Set up OAuth flow for GitHub, Google, LinkedIn with provider configuration, callback handling, account creation/linking, and token storage.

tickets.title: Build Password Reset Endpoints
tickets.description: Create POST /api/auth/forgot-password and /api/auth/reset-password with secure token generation, expiry validation, and email notifications.

tickets.title: Create Email Verification System
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/auth/verify-email and /api/auth/resend-verification with token management, rate limiting, and status updates.

tickets.title: Implement Wallet Authentication
tickets.description: Build POST /api/auth/wallet/nonce and /api/auth/wallet/verify for Web3 signature validation, account linking, and multi-chain support.

tickets.title: Build Token Management System
tickets.description: Create POST /api/auth/refresh for token refresh, blacklisting for logout, validation middleware, and token versioning for forced logout.

tickets.title: Create Session Management API
tickets.description: Implement GET /api/auth/sessions and DELETE /api/auth/sessions/:id with metadata tracking, concurrent limits, and timeout handling.

tickets.title: Implement Rate Limiting & Security
tickets.description: Add rate limiting per endpoint/IP, CAPTCHA integration, request validation, CORS configuration, helmet.js headers, and brute force protection.

tickets.title: Build Email Service Integration
tickets.description: Configure SendGrid/AWS SES with email templates (verification, reset, welcome), queue with retry logic, and delivery tracking.

tickets.title: Create User Profile Endpoints
tickets.description: Build GET/PUT /api/users/profile with avatar upload to S3, skills management, social links validation, and profile completion tracking.

tickets.title: Implement Role Management System
tickets.description: Create role assignment endpoints, permission checking middleware, role-based access control (RBAC), and role switching functionality.

tickets.title: Build Audit Logging System
tickets.description: Implement authentication event logging (login, logout, password changes), security event tracking, and suspicious activity detection.

tickets.title: Create Role Database Schema
tickets.description: Design roles, user_roles, permissions, role_permissions tables with many-to-many relationships and timestamp tracking.

tickets.title: Implement Role Assignment Endpoint
tickets.description: Build POST /api/roles/assign to assign roles to users with authorization checks, validation, and audit logging.

tickets.title: Create Role Request System
tickets.description: Implement POST /api/roles/request and GET /api/roles/requests with request creation, status tracking, and notification triggers.

tickets.title: Build Role Approval Workflow
tickets.description: Create PUT /api/roles/requests/:id/approve and /reject endpoints with admin authorization, email notifications, and status updates.

tickets.title: Implement Role Switching Endpoint
tickets.description: Build POST /api/roles/switch to change active role for multi-role users with session updates and permission refresh.

tickets.title: Create Permission Checking Middleware
tickets.description: Implement Express middleware to check user permissions for each route with role/permission validation and error responses.

tickets.title: Build Role-Based Access Control (RBAC)
tickets.description: Design RBAC system with granular permissions, role hierarchies, permission inheritance, and resource-level access control.

tickets.title: Implement Role Listing Endpoint
tickets.description: Create GET /api/roles to fetch all available roles and GET /api/users/:id/roles for user-specific roles with permissions included.

tickets.title: Create Bulk Role Management
tickets.description: Build POST /api/roles/bulk-assign for admin bulk operations with validation, transaction handling, and audit logging.

tickets.title: Implement Role Revocation System
tickets.description: Create DELETE /api/users/:id/roles/:roleId to revoke roles with cascading updates, notification system, and grace period handling.

tickets.title: Build Role Analytics Endpoints
tickets.description: Implement GET /api/analytics/roles with role distribution stats, role request metrics, and permission usage tracking.

tickets.title: Create Default Role Configuration
tickets.description: Set up system to assign default "Participant" role on registration with configurable defaults and automatic permission grants.

tickets.title: Implement Role-Based Rate Limiting
tickets.description: Configure different rate limits per role (e.g., organizers get higher limits) with Redis-based tracking and custom headers.

tickets.title: Build Role Verification System
tickets.description: Create role verification for special roles (e.g., verified organizer) with document upload, manual review, and badge assignment.

tickets.title: Set Up Database Infrastructure
tickets.description: Configure PostgreSQL database, create development/staging/production databases, set up automated backups, and implement connection pooling.

tickets.title: Configure Redis for Sessions
tickets.description: Install Redis for session storage and token blacklisting, set up persistence, configure memory limits, and implement clustering for production.

tickets.title: Set Up Email Service
tickets.description: Configure SendGrid/AWS SES accounts, set up domain verification, configure SPF/DKIM records, and implement email bounce handling.

tickets.title: Implement Secrets Management
tickets.description: Set up environment variables for JWT secrets, OAuth client credentials, database URLs, and API keys using AWS Secrets Manager or similar.

tickets.title: Configure File Storage
tickets.description: Set up AWS S3 bucket for avatar storage, configure CDN for image delivery, implement upload size limits, and add virus scanning.

tickets.title: Set Up Role Management Database Tables
tickets.description: Create database migrations for role-related tables, indexes for performance optimization, and seed data for initial roles.

tickets.title: Configure Role-Based Caching
tickets.description: Implement Redis caching for user roles and permissions with cache invalidation on role changes and TTL configuration.

tickets.title: Set Up Role-Based Monitoring
tickets.description: Configure monitoring for role assignment/revocation events, permission denial tracking, and suspicious role switching patterns.

tickets.title: Implement Role Backup System
tickets.description: Create automated backups of role assignments, scheduled exports of role configurations, and role restoration procedures.

tickets.title: Write Unit Tests for Auth Components
tickets.description: Create unit tests for all React components using Jest and React Testing Library with 80% coverage minimum.

tickets.title: Write API Integration Tests
tickets.description: Implement integration tests for all authentication endpoints using Supertest, covering happy paths and error scenarios.

tickets.title: Create E2E Tests for Auth Flows
tickets.description: Build end-to-end tests using Cypress/Playwright for registration, login, password reset, and email verification flows.

tickets.title: Perform Security Testing
tickets.description: Conduct penetration testing on auth endpoints, test for SQL injection, XSS, CSRF vulnerabilities, and validate JWT implementation.

tickets.title: Load Testing for Authentication
tickets.description: Execute load tests using K6/JMeter to validate system performance with 1000+ concurrent authentication requests.

tickets.title: Test Role Assignment Flow
tickets.description: Write tests for role assignment including authorization checks, invalid role handling, and notification triggers.

tickets.title: Test Permission Middleware
tickets.description: Create unit tests for permission checking middleware covering all roles, permission combinations, and edge cases.

tickets.title: Test Role Switching
tickets.description: Implement tests for multi-role switching including session updates, permission changes, and UI element visibility.

tickets.title: Test RBAC Implementation
tickets.description: Validate role-based access control with unauthorized access attempts, permission inheritance, and resource-level permissions.

tickets.title: E2E Role Management Tests
tickets.description: Create end-to-end tests for complete role lifecycle from request to approval to revocation using Cypress/Playwright.

tickets.title: Load Test Role Checking
tickets.description: Performance test permission checking system with 10,000+ concurrent permission checks and role switches.

tickets.title: Test Role-Based UI Rendering
tickets.description: Validate UI components render correctly for each role with permission-based visibility and feature availability.

tickets.title: DOC-1.1.1: Create API Documentation
tickets.description: Document all authentication endpoints using Swagger/OpenAPI with request/response examples and error codes.

tickets.title: DOC-1.1.2: Write Frontend Integration Guide
tickets.description: Create developer guide for implementing auth in frontend components with code examples and best practices.

tickets.title: DOC-1.1.3: Document Security Measures
tickets.description: Write security documentation covering authentication flow, token management, and security best practices implemented.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.1: Create Role Matrix Documentation
tickets.description: Document all roles, their permissions, access levels, and responsibilities in a clear matrix format.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.2: Write Role Management API Docs
tickets.description: Document all role-related endpoints with request/response examples, authorization requirements, and error codes.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.3: Create Role Request Guide
tickets.description: Write user guide for requesting additional roles including requirements, approval process, and timeline expectations.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.4: Document RBAC Implementation
tickets.description: Create technical documentation of RBAC system architecture, permission hierarchy, and integration guidelines.

tickets.title: DOC-1.2.5: Build Admin Role Management Guide
tickets.description: Write admin guide for managing user roles, handling requests, bulk operations, and troubleshooting common issues.
